Sadiq Abubakar Daba, onye a maara dị ka Sadiq Daba (1951/52 ruo 3 Maachị 2021) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri na onye mgbasa ozi. N'afọ 2015, o ritere ihe nrite Africa Movie Academy Award maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma maka ọrụ ya dị ka "Inspector Waziri" n'ọnwa Ọktoba 1.
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na St
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta dị elu n'ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ gụnyere Mahadum Ahmadu Bello na Zaria.
Daba rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye mgbasa ozi maka Nigerian Television Authority
Ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya bịara bụrụ ihe a ma ama na ngwụcha afọ 1970, na-eme ihe nkiri na Cockcrow na Dawn
N'afọ 2018, e nyere ya utu aha ahụ bụ ŌGarkuwan Nollywood (mgbe a sụgharịrị ya site n'asụsụ Hausa ọ pụtara "Ọta nke Nollywood" site n'aka ndị ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ.

Daba kwupụtara nchọpụta ya nke leukemia na ọrịa kansa prostate n'afọ 2017 ma ọtụtụ ndị Naijiria kwadoro ya site na ịnakọta ego gụnyere Josephine Obiajulu Odumakin, Mabeloboh Center For Save Our Stars(MOCSOS). Na 3 Febụwarị  afọ 2018, Daba sonyeere Project Pink Blue iji gaa ije megide ọrịa kansa iji cheta Ụbọchị Cancer Ụwa.
Ọ nwụrụ na 3 Maachị  afọ 2021 na ụlọ ọgwụ Ayinke General dị na Ikeja, Lagos.
